required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: I Can sEe Left Atrial Appendage (ICELAA) Clinical Study
clinical_study.official_title: I Can sEe Left Atrial Appendage (ICELAA) Clinical Study

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective of this study is to assess the efficacy and safety of using intra-procedural intracardiac echocardiography (ICE) for WATCHMAN FLX Device implants in subjects with non-valvular atrial fibrillation to reduce the risk of stroke.

primary_outcome.measure: Significant leak (>5 mm) as assessed by TEE at 45 days' post-implant.

intervention.description: use of intra-procedural intracardiac echocardiography during Watchman FLX devices
